creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: color image of a newspaper clipping with a photo of a woman wearing glasses and an olive-colored jacket under the headline, "Women in Science...", on top of a book with a photograph of Marie Curie in her lab
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Madame Curie and Women in Science
